synopsis.text: Follow the delightful escapades of the idols from 346 Productions in this charming series that offers a glimpse into their personal lives! The Cinderella Project's stars take a break from their demanding schedules to indulge in vacations, dine at eateries, and engage in various joyful activities. Accompanied by their dedicated producer or their fellow idols, they certainly know how to make the most of their downtime. In a departure from its customary format, Cinderella Girls Gekijou is a collection of humorous skits condensed into shorter, three-minute episodes, shining the spotlight on one or more characters at a time. Witness the idols' amusing interactions and get a rare peek at their 'real' daily lives in this delightful, comedy-filled anime adaptation of the 5-panel manga, The IDOLM@STER Cinderella Girls Gekijou.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
